title: 嗨皮咳嗽被封
author: Earfreet
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Earl_ 于 2020-1-30 20:56 编辑 

嗨皮咳嗽因为开加速器被封了，求帮写一份解封书

replies.author: 肆火
replies.txt_content:
Dear Hypixel admins, good xxxxxxxxxx.
Today when I was playing Hypixel, I used VPN because of the server network was not good. Suddenly my account was banned
I hope the admin can help me cancel the ban.
Sorry to trouble you

My id:xxxxxxxxxxxx and uuid xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
